title: Pangea Money Transfer
description:
Pangea is the fast, easy and secure way to send money to Latin America and Asia!
Create a free account easily and complete your transfer in a matter of seconds.
Send money using your bank account or debit card; friends and family can receive the money directly to their bank account, debit card, or in cash at thousands of retail locations around the globe.
Conveniently pay international bills directly to service providers and utility companies abroad.
Pangea Visa® Debit Card.  Keep all your cash in one place and use it for purchases online and offline, send money abroad or pay for International bills.
No more waiting in line. No hidden fees. Send money faster in just a few clicks!
Remittance service available to 15 countries!
Latin America
- Send money to Mexico: 20,000+ cash pickup locations Elektra, Bancoppel, Bancomer, Telecomm, Intermex, Bansefi, Chedraui, Famsa , Farmacias Guadalajara, Soriana.  Debit card or bank deposit to any bank CLABE in Mexico
- Send money to Colombia:  Bancolombia, Financiera, BBVA and more
- Send money to Dominican Republic:  Banco BHD León, Banreservas, Banco Promerica, Bancounión, Banco Providencial and more
- Send money to El Salvador: Banco Argicola, Banco Bac Credomatic Salvador, Davienda (Salvadoreno), Federcredito and more
- Send money to Guatemala: Banrural, Fenacoac / Micoope, Banco Industrial, Elektra, Banco deSarrollo Rural and more
- Send money to Honduras: Banco Atlantida, Davivienda (HSBC), Elektra, Banco Ficohsa and more
Asia
- Send money to Philippines:  6,000+ cash pickup locations at Cebuana Lhuillier, M Lhuillier, Palawan Pawnshop and deposit to BPI, Metrobank and 67+ banks
- Send money to India:  Direct transfer or UPI to ICICI Bank, Axis Bank, State Bank of India and 173+ banks
- Send money to Bangladesh:  NRB Global, Argani and 10+ banks
- Send money to Indonesia: POS Indonesia, Finnet Indonesia, Pegadaian Indonesia, Alfamart and more
- Send money to Malaysia:  Bank deposit to 44+ banks
- Send money to Singapore:  Bank of Singapore, HSBC, ICIC Bank and 11+ banks
- Send money to Thailand: Bangkok Bank, Siam Commercial Bank and 10+ banks
- Send money to Vietnam:  Cash pickup at Sacombank and deposits to 34+ banks
- Send money to China:  To your receiver's debit card or bank account at 65+ banks
description_html:
Pangea is the fast, easy and secure way to send money to Latin America and Asia!

Create a free account easily and complete your transfer in a matter of seconds.

Send money using your bank account or debit card; friends and family can receive the money directly to their bank account, debit card, or in cash at thousands of retail locations around the globe.

Conveniently pay international bills directly to service providers and utility companies abroad.

Pangea Visa® Debit Card. Keep all your cash in one place and use it for purchases online and offline, send money abroad or pay for International bills.

No more waiting in line. No hidden fees. Send money faster in just a few clicks!

Remittance service available to 15 countries!

Latin America

- Send money to Mexico: 20,000+ cash pickup locations Elektra, Bancoppel, Bancomer, Telecomm, Intermex, Bansefi, Chedraui, Famsa , Farmacias Guadalajara, Soriana. Debit card or bank deposit to any bank CLABE in Mexico
